title: 会玩【命令方块】的大神来看看

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{ActiveEffects:[{Id:11,Duration:999999999,Amplifier:50,Ambient:1}],Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:280,Count:1},sell:{id:57,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:280,Count:1},sell:{id:42,Count:1}},
{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:280,Count:1},sell:{id:133,Count:10}}]}}复制代码

你的无敌指令不好我有更好
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~?
{Invulnerable:1,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:280,Count:1},sell:{id:57,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:280,Count:1},sell:{id:42,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:280,Count:1},sell:{id:133,Count:10}}]}}复制代码

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content: 你那是假无敌，直接在offer前面加Invulnerable:1,才是真无敌。
